en.title: **Bachelor** of Computer Science
en.text:
• Programming Fundamentals: Courses introducing languages such as C, C++, Java, and Python, essential for both front-end and back-end development.

• Web Development: Subjects covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React or Angular, focusing on creating responsive user interfaces.

• Database Management Systems: Instruction on designing, implementing, and managing databases using SQL and NoSQL technologies, crucial for back-end data handling.

• Software Engineering: Emphasis on software development methodologies, version control systems, and collaborative tools, ensuring adherence to best practices in full-stack development.

• Computer Networks: Understanding network protocols and communication, vital for developing applications that operate over the internet.

• Hands-On Projects: Developing a comprehensive online shopping website, incorporating product listings, user authentication, shopping cart functionality, and payment processing.

• Thesis: `Development of an Online Shopping Platform for Handmade Products: A Case Study in Hawler`
